about_hero:
Buscargo is a complete solution for orders for transportation of larger items, or any item for transportation. For customers it is a better option to not have to call many drivers and get a quote. Those days are gone.

Now you can simply post your work on the Buscargo platform and go for a coffee, wait for our valued drivers to make an offer for your work. You will receive several bids from different evaluated drivers, all with feedback.Then choose what you want, open a conversation with him, or using our messaging system, reserve and pay for work.
hefty_work_desc: Buscargo does all the work for you. All bids placed are open. This means that each driver can see the current bids, which encourages lower bids to win the job. A type of auctions takes place and prices fall. Once the job is done, just complete it and leave the driver with an assessment.
search_help_1: On one side of the platform are customers posting jobs, on the other side of the platform are drivers and transporters to carry out the work.
search_help_2: Whether you are a company or a man with 1 or 2 vans, Buscargo is a platform for you to get jobs. Buscargo is committed to reducing CO2 emissions.
search_help_3: Our work method works like this, we encourage you to make low bids, but with several delivery jobs along a route, the same route you are going to follow.
search_help_4: It is a simple registration and we do not charge anything from our drivers for joining our platform. It is completely free for drivers. What you offer is what you receive.
